name: Student Fee Collection
query:
SELECT
    f.student AS "Student:Link/Student:200",
    f.student_name AS "Student Name::200",
    f.program AS "Standard:200",
    s.student_mobile_number AS "Mobile Number::150",
    f.due_date AS "Due Date:200",
    SUM(f.grand_total) - SUM(f.outstanding_amount) AS "Paid Amount:Currency:150",
    SUM(f.outstanding_amount) AS "Outstanding Amount:Currency:150",
    SUM(f.grand_total) AS "Grand Total:Currency:150"
FROM
    `tabFees` f
JOIN
    `tabStudent` s ON f.student = s.name
WHERE
    f.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY
    f.student
ORDER BY
    f.program;
